## ECSSystem() function

系统类型装饰器 用于为系统类指定固定的类型名称，避免在代码混淆后失效

**Signature:**

```text
export declare function ECSSystem(typeName&#58; string): <T extends new (...args&#58; any[]) => EntitySystem>(target: T) => T;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

typeName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

系统类型名称


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

&lt;T extends new (...args: any\[\]) =\> [EntitySystem](./ecs-framework-monorepo.entitysystem.md)<!-- -->\>(target: T) =\> T

## Example


```text
@ECSSystem('Movement')
class MovementSystem extends EntitySystem {
    protected process(entities: Entity[]): void {
        // 系统逻辑
    }
}
```
